item.title: Why Marvin The Martian Is Not In The Day The Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie
item.description: Marvin the Martian’s absence in The Day the Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie may seem surprising, but it makes sense given the film’s inspirations.

item.title: The New Wicked Prequel Tries To Bridge The Gap Between The Book & The Musical (And Ends Up Contradicting Both)
item.description: Elphie: A Wicked Childhood takes some liberties with the Wicked story, as it seeks to make an abridgment between the books and the musical.

item.title: I Really Wouldn't Mind If James Bond 26 Turned Into Something Else In Amazon MGM's Hands
item.description: James Bond's new creative controllers haven't revealed much about what the next 007 project will look like, but they have proven they're capable.
